src/lib/components/App.js.description:
Layout of app should be:
NavigationBar / Header
Menu and Results
Footer

id.description: The id of the main app.

loadResults.description: If the results page should be loaded (true) or the query page (false).

queryResultsId.description: The ID for the results that were submitted from the Query page.

available_llms.description:
The list of available LLMs.
The syntax should match LLM.models()

alert.description: If the alert should be shown to the user

setAlert.description: Sets if the alert should be shown to the user

alertContent.description: The content of the alert that is shown to the user.

setAlertContent.description: The setter for the alert content.

journalFamilies.description: The list of available journal families to search through.

src/lib/components/ExsclaimUiComponents..description:
ExampleComponent is an example component.
It takes a property, `label`, and
displays it.
It renders an input with the property `value`
which is editable by the user.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

label.description: A label that will be printed when this component is rendered.

value.description: The value displayed in the input.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

src/lib/components/common/Footer.js.description: The footer of the app, contains more information about Argonne and EXSCLAIM!

src/lib/components/common/Header.js.description: The header of the app, introduces the user to the EXSCLAIM UI and how to use it

alert.description: If the alert should be shown to the user

setAlert.description: Sets if the alert should be shown to the user

setAlertContent.description: The content that will be shown in the alert.

src/lib/components/common/Layout.js.description: One big container containing the UI results page. It is divided into two parts: left side menu, right side figures.

loadResults.description: If the results page should be loaded (true) or the query page (false).

queryResultsId.description: The ID for the results that were submitted from the Query page.

setLoadResults.description: The setter for the loadResults variable.

src/lib/components/common/Loading.js.description: The loading page that appears when UI is getting and posting information from the API

src/lib/components/common/Notification.j.description: On-screen notifications to the user using @mui/material's Alert

alert.description: If the alert should be shown to the user

setAlert.description: Sets if the alert should be shown to the user

setAlertContent.description: The content that will be shown in the alert.

src/lib/components/common/Query.js.description: One big container with the input query menu for the user to run EXSCLAIM

loadResults.description: If the query page should be loaded (false) or the results page (true).

setLoadResults.description: The setter for the loadResults variable.

id.description: The id of the query object.

setAlert.description: If the alert should be shown to the user

setAlertContent.description: The content that will be shown in the alert.

journalFamilies.description: The list of available journal families to search through.

src/lib/components/images/CropImage.js.description: Returns the cropped image from the given data.

data.description: The data about this image from EXSCLAIM

src/lib/components/inputs/InputButton.js.description:
Submits the user query to the API, which then runs EXSCLAIM.
After the subfigure results are loaded, the user is taken to the results page (Layout.js)

journalFamily.description: The journal family that will be searched through.

numArticles.description: The maximum number of articles to search through.

sort.description: How the articles should be sorted.

term.description: The input term to search for.

synonyms.description: Any synonyms that are related to the search term.

access.description: If the articles should be open access or not.

model.description: The name of the LLM model.

modelKey.description: The API Key needed to run the given LLM.

setProps.description: The callback for when the button is clicked.

queryId.description: The id for the most recently submitted query.

setAlert.description: If the alert should be shown to the user

setAlertContent.description: The content that will be shown in the alert.

src/lib/components/inputs/InputSynonyms..description: Gets the alternative search terms (synonyms) to be used in EXSCLAIM!

synonyms.description: Any synonyms that are related to the search term.

src/lib/components/inputs/InputTerm.js.description: Gets the main search term to be used in EXSCLAIM

term.description: The input term to search for.

src/lib/components/inputs/JournalFamily..description: Gets the journal family where EXSCLAIM! will parse through

id.description: The id of the JournalFamily box.

journalFamily.description: The journal family that will be searched through.

journalFamilies.description: The list of available journal families to search through.

src/lib/components/inputs/Model.js.description: Gets what kind of LLM (Large Langauge Model) EXSCLAIM! will use.

model.description: The name of the LLM model.

modelKey.description: The API Key needed to run the given LLM.

available_llms.description: A dictionary of available models, and if they need an API key or not.

src/lib/components/inputs/NumArticles.js.description: Gets the number of articles EXSCLAIM will parse through.

numArticles.description: The maximum number of articles to search through.

src/lib/components/inputs/OpenAccess.js.description: Toggles if EXSCLAIM should only have open access results

id.description: The id of the open access box.

access.description: If the articles should be open access or not.

setAccess.description: To access the new value in Dash.

src/lib/components/inputs/OutputName.js.description: Handles and gets the output EXSCLAIM file name inputted by the user.

outputName.description: The name of the search's output.

src/lib/components/inputs/SortBy.js.description: Gets the type of sort that EXSCLAIM will use

sort.description: How the articles should be sorted.

src/lib/components/results/ImagesPage.js.description: Displays the subfigure results of the user's input in the subfigure results menu and the query menu.

articles.description: The list of articles scraped by EXSCLAIM!

figures.description: The list of figures scraped by EXSCLAIM!

subFigures.description: The list of subfigures discovered by EXSCLAIM!

src/lib/components/search/Classification.description: Gets what type the subfigure results should be.

src/lib/components/search/KeyWords.js.description: Gets what keywords should be contained in/related to the subfigures.

src/lib/components/search/License.js.description: Gets whether the subfigure should come from an open-source project or not.

license.description: If the subfigure's license should be open-source (true) or not (false).

src/lib/components/search/ResultID.js.description:
The input box that holds the current run ID.
If the value is changed, the results from the new run ID will be added to the screen (alongside the previous values).

resultsID.description: The ID of the run who's results are being looked at.

src/lib/components/search/Scale.js.description: Gets the scale and size of the subfigure results should be.

src/lib/components/search/Submit.js.description: Submit user's query for filtered subfigures
